services.name: Standard Ride
services.description: Quick and efficient rides for your everyday travel needs, with an emphasis on safety and professionalism.

services.name: Secure VIP Ride
services.description: Premium service with enhanced security for high-profile individuals, ensuring utmost discretion and safety.

services.name: Airport Transfer
services.description: Reliable and punctual transfers to and from the airport. We track your flight to ensure timely service.

services.name: Women & Family Safe Ride
services.description: Safe and comfortable rides with trained female drivers available for women and families upon request.

testimonials.name: Mark Thompson
testimonials.quote: The service was impeccable. The driver was so professional and the ride smooth. I felt completely safe.

testimonials.name: Sarah Miller
testimonials.quote: I felt safe and comfortable throughout my journey. The best cab service I've ever used.

testimonials.name: David Clark
testimonials.quote: Reliable and efficient service. I'll definitely be using IronRide for my business travels.
